column2:
"That disappointment and regret you must be feeling...
I understand it so well that it hurts."
"But you can't let yourself give up now! Listen to your heart, and do what it tells you you have to!"
"There is always a way, as long as you just keep looking for it! Believe me, I know all about these things!"
"And I swear here and now that I will help you, even if it breaks every bone in my body!"
"...It frustrates me to admit it, but Katori is not wrong."

"If you try, you may succeed.
If you do not, failure is inevitable.
This is true in all things."
"As members of ARKS, we will support you as best we can, though I suspect Katori will be of limited use."
"You can count on us, my dear! We won't let you down!"
